<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The conditional assembly feature (.if, .else, .elseif and .endif) is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implemented with AsmCond that tells us what we are in the middle of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// processing.  Ignore can be either true or false.  When true we are ignoring</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the block of code in the middle of a conditional.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
